text: Ever Augusto Valencia Ruiz (born in 23 January 1997) is a footballer from Colombia who plays as an attacking midfielder for Atlético Bucaramanga on loan from Independiente Medellín. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1997 births Category:Living people Category:Colombian footballers Category:Independiente Medellín footballers Category:Wisła Kraków players Category:Cúcuta Deportivo footballers Category:Atlético Bucaramanga footballers Category:Categoría Primera A players Category:Ekstraklasa players Category:Colombia under-20 international footballers Category:Colombia youth international footballers Category:Expatriate footballers in Poland Category:Colombian expatriate sportspeople in Poland Category:Association football midfielders
title: Ever Valencia
